title: Nurturing attachment to school: contemporary perspectives on social, emotional and behavioural difficulties

The discussion begins with a brief consideration of the nature of SEBD and goes on to examine some of the ways in which schools can, on the one hand, create and exacerbate the problem, and, on the other, help alleviate it.
